meanings.definition: Making a loud, deep sound like an owl.
meanings.sent1: The hooty owl perched on the tree branch.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with hooty sounds at night.
meanings.sent3: The hooty owl tried to sing a lullaby but ended up waking everyone up!
meanings.sent4: The hooty wind whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The hooty call of the owl echoed through the silent night.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is comical or amusing.
meanings.sent1: The clown at the circus was a real hooty!
meanings.sent2: The movie had a hooty character that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The hooty puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes were as hooty as a barrel of monkeys.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's hooty antics had the audience in stitches.
